segments.text: This drawing shows a typical kitchen moment gone wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so engrossed in her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink overflows, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's flooding the area, and she stands in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children sneak cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks determined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But that instability could cause a big fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by waiting below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in light on the tidy yard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel disgusted by the unnecessary water waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why leave the faucet on like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The plate she's holding might slip from wet hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see potential harm in such a homey setting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They all seem oblivious to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them.
segments.speaker: PAR
